org.shared.net.filter.ssl

Class SslFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.filter.ssl.SslFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter<ByteBuffer,ByteBuffer>, OobFilter<ByteBuffer,ByteBuffer>

    public class SslFilter
extends Object
implements OobFilter<ByteBuffer,ByteBuffer>
    An implementation of Filter that encrypts/decrypts traffic using the SSL/TLS protocol.

        executor - the Executor for carrying out delegated tasks.
